disclosures.label: 3rd-party
disclosures.text: This software is not provided or supported by Linden Lab, the makers of Second Life.

disclosures.label: Warranty
disclosures.text: This software is provided AS IS, without any expressed or implied warranty.

disclosures.label: Voice
disclosures.text: We don't have the redistribution licence, but you could copy SLVoice or SLVoice.exe, libortp.dylib or ortp_x64.dll, and libvivoxsdk.dylib or vivoxsdk_x64.dll from SL viewer's Resources folder to Megapahit's Resources or libexec folder.

disclosures.label: Privacy
disclosures.text: The viewer sends data only to Second Life.

disclosures.label: Accounts
disclosures.text: Our Bugzilla may require an account made, but you are not required to make any in order to use the viewer.

disclosures.label: Materials Featurettes
disclosures.text: Parity to SL viewer default release.

disclosures.label: Improvements
disclosures.text: A less laggier tracker beacon and a pixelated Jolly Roger logo.

disclosures.label: Bug fixes
disclosures.text: On GNU/Linux and FreeBSD, group and offline messaging are fixed, and voice may now work using Wine. On macOS, the counter used for the fast timers is improved.

disclosures.label: Yet a new logo!
disclosures.text: Thalassocracy is the theme, hence the Jolly Roger logo. By Secret Foxtail.

disclosures.label: Bug fixes and improvements
disclosures.text: Credentials are now saved. Texture blurring/thrashing is reduced significantly on macOS, FPS counter & other improvements in performance by observeur Resident. Adjusted rear view offset & accordions for credits by Secret Foxtail.
